rows.label: tlk43400012_07_msg0001
rows.name:
If you'd told me Bahn's father was
puppeteering the whole affair, I'd
never have believed it.

rows.label: tlk43400012_07_msg0002
rows.name:
He was supposed to have retired long
ago. And yet he had built up an entire
syndicate in secret...

rows.label: tlk43400012_07_msg0003
rows.name:
We didn't have the slightest inkling,
and I doubt Superbia did either.

rows.label: tlk43400012_07_msg0004
rows.name:
If it hadn't been for your decisive
actions, we'd never have been able
to pin the Don down.

rows.label: tlk43400012_07_msg0005
rows.name:
You ought to be awarded special
merit for that!
